title: Ep. 65 "Different Strokes for Different Folks" ft. Justin
description:
This week we brought on the Black Adonis, Justin Howard. You may have seen some of his "work" on Vine, The Shaderoom, or even XVideos. If you've seen him before you may get why he loves to be nude, but you may not know he considers himself sapiosexual so it takes more than an open mind in the bedroom to really get a shot with this guy. He breaks it all down, gives details on last year's notorious #AtlOrgy, sex parties, and threesomes with other men involved. He's by far one of the most open minded men we've had to date, so listen now!
